structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Termination Of Reimbursement Alimony; Modification; Applicability Of Income Guidelines
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 124, Sec. 3 effective March 1, 2012 applicable as provided by 2011, 124, Sec. 4. See 2011, 124, Sec. 7.] (a) Reimbursement alimony shall terminate upon the death of the recipient or a date certain. (b) Once ordered, the parties shall not seek and the court shall not order a modification of reimbursement alimony. (c) Income guidelines in subsection (b) of section 53 shall not apply to reimbursement alimony.
